name: Baking Powder Biscuits
ingredients: 2 cups flour ½ teaspoon cream of tartar
steps: ½ cup shortening (butter or margarine works too)
Make a well in the middle and dump in all at once:
Stir quickly with fork just till dough follows fork around bowl. Turn onto lightly floured surface
(dough should be soft). Knead gently 10 to 12 strokes.
Roll or pat dough ½ inch thick. Cut into circles w/ cup or biscuit cutter.
Bake on ungreased baking sheet at 450 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes.
